text: If Jesus ends poverty that makes the poor a project instead of a people to join.

text: That‚Äôs a curious quote, since Jesus became poor for us, his life‚Äôs mission was to preach the good news to the poor, and he said, Blessed are the poor. In what sense does poverty END with Jesus? The NT seems to present Jesus as coming alongside the impoverished.
